name: zip(_:_:_:)
declaration: func zip<P, Q, T>(_ publisher1: P, _ publisher2: Q, _ transform: @escaping (Notification, P.Output, Q.Output) -> T) -> Publishers.Map<Publishers.Zip3<NotificationCenter.Publisher, P, Q>, T> where P : Publisher, Q : Publisher, Never == P.Failure, P.Failure == Q.Failure
